Class PartTimeEmployee

java.lang.Object
payrollsystem.Employee
payrollsystem.PartTimeEmployee
public class PartTimeEmployee extends Employee
Represents a part-time employee and their associated pay details. Inherits from the abstract payrollsystem.Employee class.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class payrollsystem.Employee

    position, rank

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PartTimeEmployee(String details)
    Constructs an instance of payrollsystem.PartTimeEmployee based on details parsed from a CSV string, Passes these details to the parent payrollsystem.Employee class constructor.

  • Constructor Details

    • PartTimeEmployee

      public PartTimeEmployee(String details)
      Constructs an instance of payrollsystem.PartTimeEmployee based on details parsed from a CSV string, Passes these details to the parent payrollsystem.Employee class constructor. Initializes hours worked and calculates pay-related attributes based on position and rank.
      Parameters:
      details - A comma-separated string containing the employee's information.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the employee's rank is out of bounds for the salary scale.

  • Method Details

    • getRankIndex

      public int getRankIndex()
      Gets the rank index, which is the index of the employee's rank in the salary scale.
      Returns:
      The rank index.

    • setRankIndex

      public void setRankIndex()
      Sets the rank index based on the employee's rank, ensuring it reflects the salary scale.

    • getAnnualSalary

      public double getAnnualSalary()
      Gets the annual salary for the employee.
      Returns:
      The annual salary.

    • setAnnualSalary

      public void setAnnualSalary(ArrayList<Double> salaryScale)
      Sets the annual salary based on the rank index and salary scale.
      Parameters:
      salaryScale - The salary scale for the position.

    • getHourlyRate

      public double getHourlyRate()
      Gets the hourly rate for the employee.
      Returns:
      The hourly rate.

    • setHourlyRate

      public void setHourlyRate()
      Sets the hourly rate by dividing the annual salary by 1440 (assumed work hours per year).

    • calculateBasePay

      public double calculateBasePay()
      Calculates the base pay for the pay period based on hours worked and hourly rate.

    • isClaimSubmittedOnTime

      public boolean isClaimSubmittedOnTime()
      Checks whether the last pay claim was submitted on time.
      Returns:
      True if the claim was submitted on time, false otherwise.
